A great magical power sustains the Storst Ruins in the north. I believe the {@LinkCreature:24#14#bloodhorn maligoses}, the descendants of the ancient giants, are benefiting from the power of the relics.

Maligos armor fragments may confirm this theory. If you gather them, we might measure the remaining mana and calculate the power of the ruins.

Intriguing. The fragments tingle to the touch. The power present is far beyond what we've suspected.

Your assistance will be remembered. Thank you.
An untested hypothesis is merely a question. I need armor fragments to test. Quickly.
